pages.text: Welcome to the $(thing)Bliss Modpack$()! This book will get you introduced to the ropes so you can start having fun.$(br2)The information contained in the book is designed specifically to be short and sweet, so as to not keep you here for too long, so please do pay attention! Your game is paused while you're here if you're in singleplayer.

$(thing)Bliss$() is a vanilla styled peaceful-like modpack, where you can enjoy the creative and exploratory aspsets of $(thing)Minecraft$() without worrying about combat being forced on you, or having to switch to Peaceful.$(br2)Please take a little bit of time to read the entries here in the $(thing)Welcome$() category - they're not too long, and they'll get you up to speed with everything you need to know.
